title: What is specifications of Realme 7i mobail? - Latest smartphones updats - Quora

response.answer_text: Specifications of Realme 7i :- 1.) Display :- 6.5 inches IPS LCD HD display with 90Hz refresh rate and Gorilla Glass 3 protection on top. 2.) Platform :- Android 10 with Realme UI on top. 3.) Chipset :- Qualcomm Snapdragon 662 (11 nm). 4.) Camera :- 64 mp quad camera setup at the back and 16 mp selfie camera at front. 5.) Sensors :- Fingerprint (rear mounted), gyroscope, accelerometer, proximity, compass. 6.) Sound :- Loudspeaker, and 3.5 mm headphone jack present. 7.) Memory :- Realme 7i comes in three variants which are 64 gb internal storage with 4 gb of ram, 128 gb internal storage with 4 gb of ram and 128 gb internal storage with 8 gb of ram + a dedicated slot for micro sd card as well. 8.) Battery :- 5000 mah battery with 18 watt fast charging capability with charger included in the box. I hope it helps. Thank you, peace ✌️.
